alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 2:03PM CST until December 15 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Southern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... * Until 215 PM CST. * At 203 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Trumbull, or 9 miles northeast of Hastings, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Giltner around 210 PM CST. Aurora around 215 PM CST. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 321 and 336. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
